title: Plans & Future Predictions
description: Learn vocabulary for talking about future plans, goals, and predictions.

words.meaning: something you plan to do
words.example: My intention is to finish this project by Friday.
words.exampleTranslation: 제 계획은 금요일까지 이 프로젝트를 끝내는 거예요.

words.meaning: to say what will happen in the future
words.example: Experts predict that temperatures will rise.

words.meaning: to think something will happen
words.example: I expect the meeting to last about an hour.
words.exampleTranslation: 회의가 약 한 시간 정도 걸릴 것으로 예상해요.

words.meaning: to organize or plan something
words.example: I've arranged a meeting with the client.

words.meaning: a plan for when things will happen
words.example: What's your schedule for next week?

words.meaning: the last time when something must be done
words.example: The deadline for the application is next Monday.

words.meaning: having a strong desire to succeed
words.example: She has ambitious plans for her career.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 경력에 대해 야심 찬 계획을 갖고 있어요.

words.meaning: based on facts and practical thinking
words.example: We need to set realistic goals.

words.meaning: to delay something to a later time
words.example: They decided to postpone the meeting until next week.
words.exampleTranslation: 그들은 회의를 다음 주로 연기하기로 했어요.

words.meaning: to decide that something will not happen
words.example: I had to cancel my appointment.

words.meaning: to say that something is definitely true or will happen
words.example: Can you confirm your attendance?
words.exampleTranslation: 참석 여부를 확인해 주실 수 있나요?

words.meaning: something that is more important than other things
words.example: My top priority is finishing my degree.
words.exampleTranslation: 제 최우선 과제는 학위를 마치는 거예요.

words.meaning: something that might happen or be true
words.example: There's a possibility that it will rain tomorrow.

words.meaning: used to say something is likely
words.example: I'll probably arrive around 7 o'clock.

words.meaning: without doubt; certainly
words.example: I'll definitely be there tomorrow.

words.meaning: not likely to happen
words.example: It's unlikely that we'll finish today.

words.meaning: certain to happen; unavoidable
words.example: Change is inevitable in any organization.

words.meaning: happening soon
words.example: Are you ready for the upcoming exam?

words.meaning: in the end; after a period of time
words.example: Eventually, I want to start my own business.

words.meaning: before something happens
words.example: Please book tickets in advance.

words.meaning: a statement about what will happen in the future
words.example: The weather forecast says it will be sunny.

words.meaning: to expect something to happen
words.example: We anticipate high demand for this product.
words.exampleTranslation: 이 제품에 대한 높은 수요를 예상해요.

words.meaning: a promise to do something; dedication
words.example: I've made a commitment to exercise every day.

words.meaning: purpose; to plan or intend
words.example: My aim is to become fluent in English.
words.exampleTranslation: 제 목표는 영어를 유창하게 하는 거예요.

words.meaning: to guess the size, cost, or time of something
words.example: I estimate the project will take three months.

words.meaning: to usually do something
words.example: Prices tend to rise in summer.

exercises.question: What's the _____ for submitting the application?
The meeting has been _____ until next week.
Experts _____ that technology will change our lives dramatically.
I'll _____ be there by 6 o'clock - I promise.
My top _____ is finishing my education.
Can you _____ your attendance by Friday?
There's a _____ that the event will be cancelled.
We _____ high demand during the holiday season.
